message: Let's split fairly, Bob.  A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go.
Bob, time is money, and it's losing value fast.  I'll come up slightly to 51/49 - let's close this deal.
Alice, I understand the time pressure, but a fair deal is important. I'm willing to take a slight majority at 52/48 to end this now.
Bob, this back and forth is pointless. I'm taking a hit here to close this out. 49/51, take it or leave it.
